title: The Pun Train
body:
I beleaf that a pun train must take root in the overall league community if you think your wrong your barking up the wrong tree

A Legatree fan

replies.body:
I disagree.. its such a {{champion:21}}  that no-one desides to {{champion:13}}  up and comment on this.. this drives me up {{item:3091}} ...

#Kappa

Firstly, my thought process went off the rails when I came across this thread, so thanks for that OP.

Secondly, you're all a bunch of losers. It makes me twitch to see you making such corny puns, and I garentee that you'll end up regretting it later on.

>and I garentee that you'll end up regretting it later on.

{{champion:86}} tee :3 

Nah in all serious ye bad
The tribunal should punish you for this board post, seems a little {{summoner:3}} ing for my liking, maybe try some slightly less {{champion:111}} y behaviour
